item.title: Remembering the Tip Top Drive-In: A Vintage Slice of Las Vegas Strip History
item.description:
A Neon Oasis on the Strip: Introducing the Tip Top Drive-In

Before the mega-resorts and sprawling casinos dominated the Las Vegas Strip, there existed a different kind of magic â€“ the charm of the roadside diner. Among these cherished establishments was the Tip Top Drive-In, a neon landmark that held a special place in the hearts of locals and travelers alike. Located at 1100 South Las Vegas Boulevard, at the intersection of Charleston Boulevard, the Tip Top represented a quintessential Las Vegas experience from its opening in January 1959.
